news.title: Nagpur civic body plans to construct Metro Mall in 30 months
news.para: Recently, the NMC had shortlisted a private agency which has agreed to pay Rs10 crore more than the bid amount of Rs45 crore.

news.title: Mumbai: Fire prevention measures must in buildings, says BMC
news.para: ​​“(It is a must) to furnish a certificate, ie Form B, issued by a licensed agency, twice a year -- January and July – (mentioning that these facilities are maintained and in an) efficient condition,” the BMC said in a statement.

news.title: Minister puts onus of property tax data on Thiruvananthapuram corporation
news.para: LSG minister M V Govindan, in his reply in the ongoing assembly session, said that the software fails to reflect information on tax, which has been paid, because the staff concerned do not post the payments promptly.

news.title: Aurangabad administration firm on razing 328 quarters in labour colony
news.para: While refusing to give any concrete assurance to the residents, Desai said, “As already different courts have given rulings in this case, it will be inappropriate for me to say anything on the issue.”

news.title: Karnataka cabinet approves sand policy
news.para: He added that the policy requires that sand in gram panchayat must be sold at Rs 300 per metric tonne, while riverbed sand must be sold at Rs 700 per metric tonne in urban, inter-districts and other areas.

news.title: Single-window facility to install EV chargers in buildings in Delhi
news.para: Gahlot said, on the directions of Delhi government, power discoms had empanelled 12 vendors to facilitate the installation of slow and moderate chargers.

news.title: FPIs can invest in debt securities issued by InvITs, REITS: RBI circular
news.para: "FPIs can acquire debt securities issued by InvITs and REITs under the Medium-Term Framework (MTF) or the Voluntary Retention Route (VRR)," it said.

news.title: Builders won't be able to sub-divide & sell land plots: Greater Noida authority
news.para: The Board approved a proposal for converting 14 villages into smart villages. Bhooshan informed the Board that pilot project has started in one of these villages, Maicha, and tenders for other 13 villages would be floated soon.

news.title: SC seeks centre's reply on model builder-buyer agreement
news.para: On October 4, the top court had said it is important for the country to have a model builder-buyer agreement in the real estate sector for consumer protection because developers try to put numerous clauses in it, which common people may not be aware of.

news.title: Dehradun: Illegal construction of Rs 9 crore at Lansdowne forest division
news.para: The team’s report, exclusively accessed by TOI, reveals that construction work was being carried out without the MoEF’s nod at an eco-park spread across 0.5 hectares of land in the forest division.

news.title: Uphaar fire tragedy: Delhi court awards seven-year jail to Sushil & Gopal Ansal
news.para: The court also awarded 7-year-jail term each to former court staff Dinesh Chand Sharma and two others -- P P Batra and Anoop Singh and a fine of Rs 3 lakh each on the them.

news.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank hikes home loan rates by 0.05%
news.para: The private sector lender will now be offering home loans starting from 6.55 per cent, as against 6.50 per cent earlier, as per an official statement.

news.title: Housing finance companies to grow at 8-10% in FY22: Report
news.para: Its vice president and sector head (financial sector ratings) Sachin Sachdeva said the overall on-book portfolio of HFCs in India is estimated at Rs 11 lakh crore as of June 30, 2021, with exposures across home loans (HLs), loan against property (LAP), construction finance (CF), and lease rental discounting (LRD).

news.title: Gaurs Group trims debt by 35% to Rs 1,550 crore
news.para: Gaurs Group has a receivables of around Rs 2,000 crore from customers against the properties already sold, while the pending construction cost is estimated at only Rs 400 crore.

news.title: Sobha posts net profit of Rs 48.3 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: The board has approved the issue of unlisted secured non-convertible redeemable debentures (NCDs) on a private placement basis. The size of the issue is Rs 140 crore in one or more tranches, Sobha said in the regulatory filing.
